ygData.msgSnippet: The large half-transmetal dragon saw a bot fire a missile at the city. He knew he was a decepticon. He opened his mouth and pointed his tail at the attacker.

The large half-transmetal dragon saw a bot fire a missile at the city. 
He knew he was a decepticon. He opened his mouth and pointed his tail 
at the attacker. He then unleashed a barrage of 4 energy balls and 
gatling bullets at Perceptor.

AzureBlade:Decepticons! Stop your attack, or pay the price with your 
life!!!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Perceptor::
> 
> Perceptor fired one missile against Maximal city and other missile 
against Sidewipe.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Lurker 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Sunday, September 30, 2001 10:22 AM
>   Subject: Attack!
> 
> 
>   Triggerhappy fired some shots at Orion.  Skullgrin fired at the 
base.  All of the Bodicons fired shots at Maximal City.  Jume and Whee 
fired at Sideswipe...
> 
> 
>
